response.original_title: 'Tommy Gun' on the road to Kupyansk
response.overview: This Documentary follows volunteer fighters navigating war-torn eastern Ukraine. Amid the battle for Kupyansk, the film captures raw frontline moments, personal struggle, and the human cost of modern conflict on the families and 'Rogue Team'.  A raw, boots-on-the-ground documentary that takes viewers inside frontline chaos. It delivers gripping, real-time insights into courage, sacrifice, and survival in modern war. With exclusive footage and a deeply human story, this film speaks to today’s headlines and tomorrow’s history.
response.title: 'Tommy Gun' on the road to Kupyansk
